summary: Iteration 8 testing completed successfully. All new features verified: 1) Cloudinary upload endpoint works - POST /api/upload returns cloudinary URL with storage='cloudinary', 2) Health check shows cloudinary enabled (cloudinary: true, storage: 'cloudinary'), 3) Culture Calendar endpoint /api/spark/calendar returns events structure, 4) Spark categories now include politics and finance (verified via /api/spark/categories), 5) POV (Video) button appears in post composer MediaToolbar, 6) Push notification endpoints exist - GET /api/push/vapid-key returns public key, POST /api/push/subscribe works, 7) Settings page shows Culture Calendar section with 'Post Today's Event' button, 8) Settings page shows Push Notifications toggle.

issues: Console warning: Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent - accessibility improvement needed

passed_tests: Backend: /api/upload returns cloudinary URL with storage='cloudinary'
Frontend: Settings page shows 'The Spark' section with category dropdown
Frontend: Settings page shows 'Culture Calendar' section
Frontend: Settings page shows 'Post Today's Event' button
Frontend: Settings page shows 'Push Notifications' toggle
Frontend: FAB button opens composer modal
Frontend: Composer modal shows 'Receipts' (image upload) button
Frontend: Composer modal shows 'POV' (video upload) button
Frontend: Composer modal shows 'GIF Reaction' button
Frontend: Spark posts show finance content (#BlackWealth, #FinancialLiteracy, #BuildWealth)
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: ComposerModal missing aria-describedby for accessibility - consider adding DialogDescription component
seed_data_creation: Created test push subscription during testing (endpoint: https://test.push.service/test-endpoint-12345). Uploaded test image to Cloudinary.

mocked_apis.notes: Cloudinary is fully configured and working with real credentials. Push notifications use default VAPID keys for development.

context_for_next_testing_agent: All iteration 8 features working: Cloudinary upload (cloud_name: dtr9wu1fw), Culture Calendar with BIPOC-focused dates, POV video upload (50MB limit), Push notification infrastructure with VAPID keys. Test user: sparktest@blvx.app / Test123!. Spark categories: music, tech, culture, politics, finance. Settings page has The Spark, Culture Calendar, and Push Notifications sections.
